1213160.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 010 - Heroes 3 (Token Pack)
1213160.description:
Jans Tokenpack 011 - Countryside Villagers

These are heroes of the lesser common races.
The giant bird like creatures that live in tribes. They will rarely seek out a life as an adventurer, and only leave the safety of their tribe if the reason is strong enough.
The raven creatures are birdfolk, but they don't have wings. Their greatest wish is to be able to fly.
The agile catfolk that make great rogues.
The mountain folk are humanoids that live in the cold mountains and poses a natural strength.
This pack contains 22 unique tokens with 2 extra color/weapon variations for each token:
  • Giant Birdfolk: Barbarian, Wizard, Fighter, Monk, Ranger
  • Wingless Birdfolk: Fighter, Monk, Ranger, Rogue, Warlock
  • Catfolk: Bard, Fighter, Monk, Ranger, Rogue, Warlock, Wizard
  • Mountainfolk: Male Barbarian, Female Barbarian, Fighter, Male Ranger, Female Ranger
May you have great adventures with these tokens!
Enjoy your adventures!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
